thread.title: Who Were the Best Dressed Stars at the 2017 NAACP Image Awards?

author: VH1
title: Who Were the Best Dressed Stars at the 2017 NAACP Image Awards?
text:
Who Were the Best Dressed Stars at the 2017 NAACP Image Awards? Swipe right for all the stunning fashion looks you like. by VH1 3h ago 
By Jasmine Washington 
Entertainment A-Listers flocked to Los Angeles’ Pasadena Civic Auditorium in honor of the 48th annual NAACP Image Awards last night. Hosted by Blackish star Anthony Anderson , the Image Awards honors oustanding performances in film, literature, music and television. Before the big show kicked off, stars like John Legend , Taraji P. Henson and VH1’s own Tami Roman hit the red carpet showing off their fashionable ensembles. From vintage inspired gowns, hello Yara Shahidi , to Andra Day ’s mod two-piece, it’s clear that these celebs were here to slay! 
For the 2017 Grammy Awards, we put together some cocktails suggestions in honor of some of our favorite nominated divas ( BeyoncĂŠ , Adele , Rihanna ) along with some drinking rules to get you through music’s biggest night.
